definition.text: It is possible to inject into a docs page, a hierarchy of nodes, starting on a node specified and letting the system to figure out which are it's decendents.

paragraphs.text: When you edit a paragraph of hierarchy style, the system expects you to follow this syntax:
Project: refers to any of the projects already integrated into Superalgos, including Superalgos itself.
Node Type: any valid node type in the context of the project specified.
Levels: the number of generations downstream, starting from the node type specified, that will be rendered at the docs page. The maximun number of levels is 8.
